utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Phoebe, are you still on hold? I was supposed to call my Dad back like two hours ago.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, he clipped on, he said call him as soon as you get a chance, he's at Flimby's.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's Flimby's?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, that's the word I use when I can't remember the real thing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Hang up! That's it! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! Rachel, that's what they want me to do. My warranty expires tomorrow, if I don't get through, they're not gonna fix my crappy, broken phone for free! We cannot let them win! It's us versus them!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ye-e-es!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, listen I gotta double check for tickets tonight. Who-who got what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I need two. I'm bringing Pete. My boyfriend. I have a boyfriend now!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Two it is. Ross, how about you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, yeah, I ah, I also need two.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? Who's number two?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who's number two? One of the more difficult games sewer workers play.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, no, it's-it's just this person.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Like a date type person?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, kinda. It's this woman from work. I hope that won't be too weird. Will it, Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. No, not at all, not at all. I actually was gonna bring someone myself, so...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But you said one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I meant, me plus one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Did ah, you guys mean you plus one?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, I'll see you tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I need a date!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey, you guys are finally gonna get to meet Kate!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And I ah, borrowed some of your cologne. I hope she likes it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, what are you doing?! It's never gonna happen, she's seeing somebody.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, and I don't have any cologne.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The green bottle next to the shaving cream.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! Worm medicine for the duck.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here you go. You can wear this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Ooh, I'm setting the phone down. But I'm still here! Just don't go anywhere I'm still here. Don't-don't switch or anything, 'cause I'm, I'm right here. Just one sec. One sec! One second!! Wait! One second! Just...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?! Monica, I'm scared!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right. Honey, that's-that's a sleeve. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And! We also have speaker phone.

utterance.speaker: Hold Voice
utterance.content: Please, stay on the line. Your call is important to us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, wait, you gotta hang up 'cause we're gonna be late.

utterance.speaker: Hold Voice
utterance.content: Thank you for your patience, you're the next caller.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes!! Yes!! I'm the next caller! You were gonna have me hang up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Can you take a duck and a chick to the theatre?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course not.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. I just wanted them to hear it from somebody else.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, hey Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So it's looks like we're the first ones here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, looks that way. First ones here! Wooo!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yay!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Tommy, this is Ross. Ross, Tommy.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. Oh, I'm sorry, this is Cailin.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And! Break!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, uhh, I think I'm going to run to the ladies room.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Cailin
utterance.content: I'll join you.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: I'll get our seats.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. So uh, well, this-this is uh, this is awkward.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well y'know 'cause Rachel and I used to go out.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Oh, I didn't, I didn't know that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! Well then this is awkward. So what do you uh...

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: I think we're here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Uh, huh. Excuse me, I'm sorry, I-I think you may be in our seats.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Umm, no, I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Can-can we take a look at your ticket?

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yep! Yeah, see this says D-13, and uh...

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Oh, well I thought that ah...

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Oh, you thought, huh? Yeah, well that didn't really work out too well for you did it you idiot!! What are you?! A moron!! Huh?! It says D-13! Okay?! Look you're surrounded by even numbers!! Did that give you some clue?!

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Uh, the usher told us to come...

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Oh! Oh! The usher must be right! What, with all that training they go through! Get out!! Here! Hey man, you want the aisle?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I'm good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There he is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There's our star!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, so, what'd ya think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Almost as good as that play with the two naked girls on the see-saw.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I-I wasn't in that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-oh, hey-hey, Kate! Listen I want you to meet everybody. Everybody, this is Kate.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Excuse me. Excuse me. Sweetheart! Come!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So that's the girl you like.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm telling you, this guy Rachel is with is crazy! Okay? He viscously screamed at total strangers! I think he's baaad news!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait a minute, wait a minute, you don't like the guy Rachel's dating? Well, that's odd.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey, Lauren. Uh, you guys this is, this is Kate's understudy, Lauren.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi!

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey. Gosh, you look soo familiar.

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: Oh, yeah! I-I ran into you in the hallway in your building. It was right after I slept with Joey. He dumped me the next day.

utterance.speaker: Cailin
utterance.content: So. How'd you guys meet?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Well ah, the short version is, I ah pursued her for a couple of months, then I gave her a check for 20,000 dollars, and she was mine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, and in the long version, I dump him for telling people the short version.

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: Joey, sweetheart, you were fabulous!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey you guys, this is my agent, Estelle.

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: How do you do. Ooh, you two girls were outstanding! Did they have representation?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, they-they weren't in the play.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We're not actors.

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: Ooh, what a shame! Because with her face and her chest I could really put something together.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Could I borrow it?

utterance.speaker: Cailin
utterance.content: Hi! Remember me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! Yeah! Tommy's in line for the bathroom and someone just cut in front of him, I think he's gonna snap.

utterance.speaker: Cailin
utterance.content: Ross, I'm gonna go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Go? Why?

utterance.speaker: Cailin
utterance.content: I don't know. Could be because I don't feel like standing around all night waiting for some guy who may or may not scream.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But-but Cailin, he definitely will scream.

utterance.speaker: Cailin
utterance.content: Good bye Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, oh-ho bye.

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Here we go people! Boxing Day! The Lucille Lortel Theatre, blah-la-la-la... Ah-ha! Joey Tribianni, gives an uneven performance, but Mr. Tribianni is not the worst thing in this production.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!!! Ha-ha-ha!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: Kate Miller's awkward and mannered portrayal is laughable. Badda-badda-badda. Ah-ha! Here it is! The direction by Marshal Talmant is... Thank you, boys and girls, you've ruined my life. Please, stuff your talentless faces with my Mother's crab cakes! Excuse me!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Anyone mind if I save this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, is the play over?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. Where were you?

utterance.speaker: Hold Voice
utterance.content: Thank you for your patience, you're the next caller.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You were the next caller five hours ago. You must be going crazy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nah. I kept myself busy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay, yeah. I put your stuff in her room, and her stuff in your room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Fabulous.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen, drama critics they're nothing but, but people who couldn't make it as actors. You know what you should do?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Become a drama critic!

utterance.speaker: The Director
utterance.content: I am hurt! A plague on both your houses!

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: By the way, he dumped me tonight after he read my review.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, classy.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Yep! I sure know how to pick 'em, huh? Y'know I gave up a part on a soap for this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Yeah I ah, I gave up a job too.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Really. What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, de-clawing cats. Hey, tell ya what. Let me walk you home. We'll stop by every news stand and burn every copy of their Times and the Post.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Why the Post?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you didn't see the Post?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: No. You?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: So you really think those newspapers are just jealous of me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, absolutely! You're talented and you're good looking.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Oh, you're sweet and cute.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! That's why they trashed me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa. Wait a minute, wait a minute.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I, I don't get you. I mean first, you hate me. Then you sleep with me. Then you want nothing to do with me, now you want me again.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: What? So you never went out with an actress before?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Kate, do you even like me?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Of course I do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well so, how come you blew me off? Y'know? How come you were with him?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: I don't know! I just, just do this! I-I always have to pick the like the smartest guy, or-or the most talented guy... Why can't I just pick someone like you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: You know what I mean. I mean like the sweetest guy. Joey, you're just so, you're so, so...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, okay, hey. There we go, let's get your feet up there. Good night, Kate. Sweet dreams. I'm gonna put this can right here in case you have to hurl.

utterance.speaker: Hold Voice
utterance.content: Please stay on the line. You're call is very important to us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Pheebs, you've been up for 24 hours! Go to sleep, honey. Th-this isn't healthy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, I'm fine, and y'know why? 'Cause of all the riboflavin.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Didn't you have that outfit on last night?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! I stayed at Kate's, but ah, nothing happened. Hey, Pheebs, where were ya?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm so, so, so sorry, Joey. I definitely am gonna see you're play. I swear you're play is very important to us, thank you for your patience. You're play is the next play is the next play I'm gonna see.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Anyway, how did it go with Kate?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it was great! Yeah, I-I walked her home, and it was amazing how much we connected, y'know? Then ah, then she passed out, but then she woke up. Yeah? And we stayed up all night talking, and now we're like totally crazy about each other!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, you had the night!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When two people finally realise their feelings for each other, and-and they talk for hours, and they-they learn all about the other person!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You-you think?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did you like learn about her family?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Two brothers, one died!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: This is from the woman at the bar.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh-ho-ho-ho.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Sorry. She thought you were somebody else.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What time is it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: One.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: One.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: 7:15. Watch doesn't work.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tommy's supposed to be here soon, we're going to lunch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look. Look, I wasn't going to say anything to you, but... All right, I don't think you should be seeing Tommy anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You don't?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! The guy is mean. I mean really mean. I think you should stay away from him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, or, maybe, I should stay away from all men.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, it's not just 'cause I'm jealous. I mean I'm not, I'm not, I'm not jealous, okay? It's... Look, the guy, he screamed, he actually screamed at this couple sitting in our seats.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, and at the end of the play, he, he got up y'know, and he just started like, banging his hands together!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, fine, fine. You don't want to believe me? No, that's fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're kidding!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross, don't. Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You don't want to believe me, I'm Mr. Funny to you. Mr. Funny...

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Whoa!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa, sorry Tommy.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: What's in the cup, Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, it's coffee.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Ice coffee? Tell me it's ice coffee!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's-it's hot...

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Hot coffee!!! You idiot!! You were gonna spill hot coffee all over me, huh?!! What are you just some big, dumb, stupid, doofy idiot, with a doofy idiot hairdo, huh?! Huh?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's your favourite thing about summertime?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, going to the beach. When it stays light real late.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tommyyyy! Say, what's your favourite thing about summer?

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Ooh, I don't know. Probably the smell of freshly cut grass.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohh, that's a good one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sorry! Sorry, I'm late; sorry, I'm late! My duck and my chick and a fight, it-it was ugly.

utterance.speaker: Stage Manager
utterance.content: Look, we held the curtain for you buddy. Come on, let's go! Let's go!

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: Vic! Where have you been, baby?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where's Kate?

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: She got a job in L.A.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: I've been waiting up all night for ya. Where have you been? Where have you been? Vic?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, ahh, go to the window. I'm wanna run down to the truck and show you something.

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: What do you got down there, Vic? What do you got under that tarp?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: When is she leaving?

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: Tonight. What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm coming up!

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Hey, mind if I use the phone?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why don't you use ours across the hall, 'cause she...has...problems.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-ho, whoa! Sorry, Tommy. I almost spilled this hot coffee on you.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Yeah, but you didn't.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, but it's-it's-it's hot!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, would you just stop it! It's getting really old.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe no one believes me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I do, I believe you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You do Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. But I also believed her when she said I was next.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Ooh, hey! Hey, there little fella. Mr. Fuzzy-Man, how are you doing? Aww. Eww! Oh! Eww! Gross! Idiot!! Stupid little, fuzzy, yellow creature!! Oh look at me, I'm so cute, I'm a little chick who's disgusting! God, you're so stupid, how are you not yet extinct!! Quack-quack, quack-quack!! What are you quacking about?! Dumb Donald Doo-Doo!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Step away from the duck.

utterance.speaker: Tommy
utterance.content: Ooh, sorry little Mr. Chic-A-Dee, sorry you went doody in my hand! Well, I guess we're not going out anymore. Whaa!!!

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: I'm soo glad I caught you, I couldn't find you before.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wh-wh-what's going on? Wh-what's this about L.A.?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: They still want me for General Hospital.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But, but wh-what about us?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Last night was wonderful. But I-I can't stay here just for you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, so, stay for the museums!

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Stage Manager
utterance.content: Joey, onstage!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well can you at least stay to the end of the play? I mean, I'll go to the airport with ya, I-I wanna say good bye.

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: Where are you Vic?

utterance.speaker: Kate
utterance.content: Flight's in an hour. I-I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: Vic! Vic! Vic!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: In a minute!!

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: So this is it? Victor?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess it is. Listen, I ah, I gotta say good bye, and-and I gotta say it quick 'cause this is killing me. One thing you gotta know, is that I will never forget you. But, you've got things you have to do now, and so do I. And so... I'm gonna get on this spaceship, and I'm gonna go to Blargon 7 in search of alternative fuels. But when I return, 200 years from now, you'll be long gone. But I won't have aged at all. So you tell your great-great-granddaughter to look me up, because Adrienne, baby, I'm gonna want to meet her.

utterance.speaker: Lauren
utterance.content: So long, Vic!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, it's been two days.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. Oh, good thing it's one of those 801 numbers. Right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, 800 is toll free, 801 is-is Utah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, no, oh no-no-no, it's has to be 800. 'Cause all those big companies have 800 numbers, every one. Yeah, every big Utah-based company has one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoe-be!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sorry, I'm so sorry, I will pay you back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And yet, she's still not hanging up the phone.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hang it up! Hang up the phone!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine! Fine! Oh-oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I think I broke it. But that's all right, here's the number you can call.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.
